5.Copie todo o conteudo da pasta CRACK , para onde foi instalado o jogo.
6.Clic no arquivo nfs16setupreg COM O BOTAO DIREITO EXECUTAR COMO ADMINSTRADOR.

Assim seu jogo vai ficar totalmente em Espanhol.

------------------------INGLES--------------------


1. thank
2.Clic Right-click on the image and RIDE WITH ISO (UltraISO)
3. Click on Setup.exe
4. Let vai install completely and enjoying a very good electronic music, because the installation is sooo slow ...
5.Copie entire contents of the folder CRACK , where the game was installed.
6.Clic the file nfs16setupreg right RUN AS administrator.
7. Open the folder Data/Win32/Loc
8.Apague all files and allow only those: Audio_es.sb - Audio_es.toc - es.sb - es.toc
So your game will be entirely in Spanish.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS

Windows Vista/7
3.0GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Equivalent CPU
3GB RAM for Vista
DVD ROM Drive
18GB Free Hard Drive Space
NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT 512MB/ATI 4870 512MB
DirectX 10 Compatible
512KBPS Internet Connection

RECOMMENDED

Windows 7
3.0GHz Intel Core 2 Quad or AMD Equivalent CPU
4GB RAM for Vista
DVD ROM Drive
18GB Free Hard Drive Space
NVIDIA GeForce GTX560 1024MB/ATI Radeon 6950 1024MB
DirectX 11 Compatible
512KBPS Internet Connection
